Adam ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ).from sentence: We use the Adam ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) for optimization .

pretrained GloVe - 840B - 300D vectors.from sentence: We use pretrained GloVe - 840B - 300D vectors as our word - level embeddings and fix these embeddings during the training process .

all hidden states.from sentence: Stacked BiLSTM has 3 layers , and all hidden states of BiLSTMs and MLP have 600 dimensions .

100 dimensions.from sentence: The character embedding has 15 dimensions , and CNN filters length is [ 1 , 3 , 5 ] , each of those is 100 dimensions .

Out - of - vocabulary ( OOV ) words.from sentence: Out - of - vocabulary ( OOV ) words are initialized randomly with Gaussian samples .
